title: Active Learning-Based Technical/Oral Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Operating online communities to facilitate peer feedback exchange and activate peer assessment among learners

learning_goals: Learners can produce oral presentation materials using smartphone-based tools (e.g., recording apps, collaboration platforms) through weekly missions over 8 weeks.
Learners can analyze peers' presentations via a peer review system and suggest at least three specific improvement points.
At the course's conclusion, learners demonstrate a 20%+ improvement in competency by completing an integrated technical-communication project (e.g., designing a social issue resolution campaign).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
